results:
Based on the search results, I can provide you with information about the Polish edition of "Diuna" (Dune) by Frank Herbert published by Wydawnictwo Iskry:

The novel "Diuna" was first published in Poland in 1985 by Wydawnictwo Iskry (Iskry Publishing House) in translation by Marek Marszał. 

The book was part of the "Fantastyka Przygoda" (Fantasy Adventure) series and featured a cover by Kazimierz Hałajkiewicz. Marek Marszał's translation of the first Polish version of "Diuna" from 1985 continues to enjoy the greatest recognition and popularity among fans of the series.

The first Polish translation appeared in 1986 (note: other sources consistently say 1985), and it was done by Marek Marszał and was considered the best Polish translation until then. 

There are two main Polish translations known: one by Marek Marszał and another by Jerzy Łoziński (writing under the pseudonym Ładysław Jerzyński). Marszał's translation is considered more faithful to the original and closer to genre fans.

The search results confirm that this 1985/1986 edition by Wydawnictwo Iskry with Marek Marszał's translation was indeed the first Polish publication of Frank Herbert's "Diuna" and remains highly regarded among Polish science fiction readers.
